channel.title: Add items to pk point shop?
channel.description:
how do i add items to my pk point shop?
and change prices of the items that is currently there? :confused: :confused:
please help me :)

item.title: Add items to pk point shop?
item.dc:creator: @gavman9966 gavman9966
item.description:
@gavman9966 wrote:

what source if its a PI go to the Shopassistant.java and look for the item id you want to change price of and case: ITEM ID return PRICE

Read full topic

item.title: Add items to pk point shop?
item.dc:creator: @Leoiscool Leoiscool
item.description:
@Leoiscool wrote:

Search for public void loadquestinterface. if u have that like END OF QUEST LIST if u scroll down delete all that and put [code] public void loadquestinterface() {
sendQuest("@cya@PK Point Rewards!", 640);
sendQuest("@red@Buy these items with PK pts!", 663);
sendQuest("", 682);

    /* Free Quests*/
    if (q1stage == -1) {
        sendQuest("@gre@Invisible Armour", 7332);
    }
    if (q1stage >= 1) {
        sendQuest("@yel@Invisible Armour", 7332);
    }
    if (q1stage == 0) {
        sendQuest("@gre@DeathSpawn Amulet [20]", 7332);
    }
    if (q2stage == -1) {
        sendQuest("@red@VestaZcape", 7333);
    }
    if (q2stage >= 1) {
        sendQuest("@red@VestaZcape", 7333);
    }
    if (q2stage == 0) {
        sendQuest("@gre@Bandos Set [5]", 7333);
    }
    if (q3stage == -1) {
        sendQuest("@gre@Spells Of The Gods", 7334);
    }
    if (q3stage >= 1) {
        sendQuest("@yel@Spells Of The Gods", 7334);
    }
    if (q3stage == 0) {
        sendQuest("@gre@Phats [20]", 7334);
    }
    if (q4stage == -1) {
        sendQuest("@gre@The Story Of Ramen", 7336);
    }
    if (q4stage >= 1) {
        sendQuest("@yel@The Story Of Ramen", 7336);
    }
    if (q4stage == 0) {
        sendQuest("@cya@D Claws [50!]", 7336);
    }
    sendQuest("@gre@Scythe [30]", 7383);
    sendQuest("@gre@Basket of Eggs [2]", 7339);
    sendQuest("NULL! Dont buy this one [10]", 7338);
    sendQuest("", 7340);
    sendQuest("", 7346);
    sendQuest("", 7341);
    sendQuest("", 7342);
    sendQuest("", 7337);
    sendQuest("", 7343);
    sendQuest("", 7335);
    sendQuest("", 7344);
    sendQuest("", 7345);
    sendQuest("", 7347);
    sendQuest("", 7348);
    sendQuest("", 7349);
    sendQuest("", 7350);
    sendQuest("", 7351);
    sendQuest("", 7352);
    sendQuest("", 7353);
    sendQuest("", 7354);

    /* Members Quests*/
    sendQuest("", 12772);
    // unknown id
    sendQuest("", 7357);
    sendQuest("", 12836);
    sendQuest("", 7358);
    sendQuest("", 7359);
    sendQuest("", 14169);
    sendQuest("", 10115);
    sendQuest("", 14604);
    sendQuest("", 7360);
    sendQuest("", 12282);
    sendQuest("", 13577);
    sendQuest("", 12839);
    sendQuest("", 7361);
    sendQuest("", 11857);
    sendQuest("", 7362);
    sendQuest("", 7363);
    sendQuest("", 7364);
    sendQuest("", 10135);
    sendQuest("", 4508);
    sendQuest("", 11907);
    sendQuest("", 7365);
    sendQuest("", 7366);
    sendQuest("", 7367);
    sendQuest("", 13389);
    sendQuest("", 7368);
    sendQuest("", 11132);
    sendQuest("", 7369);
    sendQuest("", 12389);
    sendQuest("", 13974);
    sendQuest("", 7370);
    sendQuest("", 8137);
    sendQuest("", 7371);
    sendQuest("", 12345);
    sendQuest("", 7372);
    sendQuest("", 8115);
    // unknown id
    sendQuest("", 8576);
    sendQuest("", 12139);
    sendQuest("", 7373);
    sendQuest("", 7374);
    sendQuest("", 8969);
    sendQuest("", 7375);
    sendQuest("", 7376);
    sendQuest("", 1740);
    sendQuest("", 3278);
    sendQuest("", 7378);
    sendQuest("", 6518);
    sendQuest("", 7379);
    sendQuest("", 7380);
    sendQuest("", 7381);
    sendQuest("", 11858);
    // unknown id
    sendQuest("", 9927);
    sendQuest("", 7349);
    sendQuest("", 7350);
    sendQuest("", 7351);
    sendQuest("", 13356);

    /* END OF ALL QUESTS*/
}[/code]

Then search for switch (actionButtonId) {

and under that put /*banking */ case 28164: teleEffect = 2; sendQuest("Are you sure?", 2470); sendQuest("~20 PK Points for a DeathSpawn Amulet~", 2471); sendQuest("Yes.", 2472); sendQuest("No.", 2473); sendFrame164(2469); break; case 28165: teleEffect = 3; sendQuest("Are you sure?", 2470); sendQuest("~5 PK Points for a Full Bandos set~", 2471); sendQuest("Yes.", 2472); sendQuest("No.", 2473); sendFrame164(2469); break; case 28166: teleEffect = 4; sendQuest("Are you sure?", 2470); sendQuest("~20 PK Points for a White & Blue Phat~", 2471); sendQuest("Yes.", 2472); sendQuest("No.", 2473); sendFrame164(2469); break; case 28168: teleEffect = 5; sendQuest("Are you sure?", 2470); sendQuest("~50 PK Points for Dragon Claws~", 2471); sendQuest("Yes.", 2472); sendQuest("No.", 2473); sendFrame164(2469); break; case 28215: teleEffect = 6; sendQuest("Are you sure?", 2470); sendQuest("~50 PK Points for a Scythe~", 2471); sendQuest("Yes.", 2472); sendQuest("No.", 2473); sendFrame164(2469); break; case 28171: teleEffect = 7; sendQuest("Are you sure?", 2470); sendQuest("~2 PK Points for a Basket of Eggs~", 2471); sendQuest("Yes.", 2472); sendQuest("No.", 2473); sendFrame164(2469); break; case 28170: teleEffect = 8; sendQuest("Are you sure?", 2470); sendQuest("~10 PK Points for a Saradomin Mage Set~", 2471); sendQuest("Yes.", 2472); sendQuest("No.", 2473); sendFrame164(2469); break;

now search for customcommand("home");

now under that put [code] case 9167:
if (teleblock == true) { // Made by Mod Allstar
sendMessage(“A magical force stops you from teleporting.”);
} else if(teleEffect == 1){
setAnimation(715);
teleportToX = 2389 + misc.random(1);
teleportToY = 3074 + misc.random(2);
sendMessage(“Welcome to Low Level Training.”);
RemoveAllWindows();
}
break;

	case 9168:
            if(teleEffect == 2 && pkpoints >= 20) {
    addItem(4250,1);
    pkpoints -= 20;
    sendMessage("You used 20 PK Points for a DeathSpawn Amulet!");
    sendMessage("Congratulations!");
        PlayerHandler.messageToAll = ("[SERVER] " + playerName + " has bought a DeathSpawn Amulet for 20 PK Points!");
    RemoveAllWindows();
    } else if(teleEffect == 2 && pkpoints <= 19) {
    sendMessage("You don't have enough PK Points! You currently have " +pkpoints+" PK Points.");
    RemoveAllWindows();
	} else if(teleEffect == 3 && pkpoints >=5) {
    addItem(15348,1);
    addItem(15349,1);
    addItem(15350,1);
    pkpoints -= 5;
    sendMessage("You used 5 PK Points for Full Bandos!");
    sendMessage("Congratulations!");
        PlayerHandler.messageToAll = ("[SERVER] " + playerName + " has bought a Full Bandos set for 5 PK Points!");
    RemoveAllWindows();
    } else if(teleEffect == 3 && pkpoints <= 4) {
    sendMessage("You don't have enough PK Points! You currently have " +pkpoints+" PK Points.");
    RemoveAllWindows();
	} else if(teleEffect == 4 && pkpoints >=20) {
    addItem(1042,1);
    addItem(1048,1);
    pkpoints -= 20;
    sendMessage("You used 20 PK Points for a Blue & White Phat!");
    sendMessage("Congratulations!");
        PlayerHandler.messageToAll = ("[SERVER] " + playerName + " has bought a White&Blue Phat for 20 PK Points!");
    RemoveAllWindows();
    } else if(teleEffect == 4 && pkpoints <= 19) {
    sendMessage("You don't have enough PK Points! You currently have " +pkpoints+" PK Points.");
    RemoveAllWindows();
	} else if(teleEffect == 5 && pkpoints >=50) {
    addItem(6587,5);
    pkpoints -= 50;
    sendMessage("You used 50 PK Points for 5 Dragon Claws!");
    sendMessage("Congratulations!");
        PlayerHandler.messageToAll = ("[SERVER] " + playerName + " has bought 5 Dragon Claws for 50 PK Pts");
    RemoveAllWindows();
    } else if(teleEffect == 5 && pkpoints <= 49) {
    sendMessage("You don't have enough PK Points! You currently have " +pkpoints+" PK Points.");
    RemoveAllWindows();
	} else if(teleEffect == 6 && pkpoints >=30) {
    addItem(1419,1);
    pkpoints -= 30;
    sendMessage("You used 30 PK Points for a Scythe!");
    sendMessage("Congratulations!");
        PlayerHandler.messageToAll = ("[SERVER] " + playerName + " has bought a Scythe for 30 PK Points!");
    RemoveAllWindows();
    } else if(teleEffect == 6 && pkpoints <= 29) {
    sendMessage("You don't have enough PK Points! You currently have " +pkpoints+" PK Points.");
    RemoveAllWindows();
	} else if(teleEffect == 7 && pkpoints >=2) {
    addItem(4565,1);
    pkpoints -= 2;
    sendMessage("You used 2 PK Points for a Basket of Eggs!");
    sendMessage("Congratulations!");
        PlayerHandler.messageToAll = ("[SERVER] " + playerName + " has bought a Basket of Eggs for 2 PK Points!");
    RemoveAllWindows();
    } else if(teleEffect == 7 && pkpoints <= 1) {
    sendMessage("You don't have enough PK Points! You currently have " +pkpoints+" PK Points.");
    RemoveAllWindows();
	} else if(teleEffect == 8 && pkpoints >=10) {
    addItem(14570,1);
    addItem(14567,1);
    addItem(2415,1);
    addItem(3763,1);
    addItem(6629,1);
    addItem(6619,1);
    addItem(4513,1);
    pkpoints -= 10;
    sendMessage("You used 10 PK Points for a Saradomin Mage Set!");
    sendMessage("Congratulations!");
        PlayerHandler.messageToAll = ("[SERVER] " + playerName + " has bought a Saradomin Mage Set for 10 PK Points!");
    RemoveAllWindows();
    } else if(teleEffect == 8 && pkpoints <= 9) {
    sendMessage("You don't have enough PK Points! You currently have " +pkpoints+" PK Points.");
    RemoveAllWindows();
    }
	break;[/code]

now add public int teleEffect;
at where the public int’s are.

now compile and the rewards will be in quest tab…
this is allstar (Czar) but you can try it out anyways, if u have any errors please let me know

Read full topic

item.title: Add items to pk point shop?
item.dc:creator: @Loveandpower Loveandpower
item.description:
@Loveandpower wrote:

Use the tutorial in tutorial section on adding a slayer shop to add a pk point shop. You can go to shopassistant.java and then go to specialValues and make cases for the items in the shop.
